description:
syscall: add constants for flock() system call under Linux.

The values have been generated only for the i386 and amd64 architectures.

messages.text:
http://codereview.appspot.com/5452060/diff/2002/src/pkg/syscall/mkerrors.sh
File src/pkg/syscall/mkerrors.sh (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5452060/diff/2002/src/pkg/syscall/mkerrors.sh#newcode26
src/pkg/syscall/mkerrors.sh:26: #include <sys/file.h>
On 2011/12/07 05:25:11, mikioh wrote:
> might be better not only for Linux.
> 
> e.g.,
> includes='
> #include <dirent.h>
> #include <errno.h>
> #include <fcntl.h>
> #include <sys/file.h>
> #include <sys/resource.h>
> #include <sys/socket.h>
> #include <sys/types.h>
> #include <netinet/in.h>
> #include <netinet/ip.h>
> #include <netinet/ip6.h>
> #include <netinet/tcp.h>
> #include <signal.h>
> #include <sys/signal.h>
> '

Done.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: bradfitz@google.com, dsymonds@google.com, golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.
